title: revert back to normal client
body:
how do i revert back?
i find item sets extremely useful. 100% regretting the decision to update to new client
as it lacks this feature.

replies.body: With our recent [client update blog,](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/client-beta-update-2-replacing-legacy-client-1) we're coming really close to phasing everyone into the updated client now.  Item sets aren't ready for the updated client yet, but per that article it's going to get worked on.  The sooner we get everyone on the updated client, the sooner our client devs can work on new features.  Hang tight for now, but feel free to offer any feedback on this through the blog or [client discussion boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion).  Let me know if that clears things up!
